author: Tyler Aquilina
title: Amazon Prime Video kids' shows now available for free to all users
description: Amazon has lifted its Prime Video paywall on a select group of kids' TV shows, including 'Arthur,' 'Caillou,' 'If You Give a Mouse a Cookie,' and more.
content:
As we enter another week of the Great Coronavirus Quarantine, Amazon is doing its part to help occupy your kids while you work from home.
Amazon has lifted its Prime Video paywall for a select group of kids' TV shows available on its streaming platform, with… [+1129 chars]
